trends: There have been no other sightings in Urbana
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsmy wife was dropping me off at work when we both noticed a bright shiny object against the blue cloudless sky immediately after driving out of a bend in the road. the sighting was of what appeared to be a disk shaped object viewed from the side. the object was reflecting sunlight equally across its surface that looked to be shiny and metallic. its was wobbling on its axis which caused the sunlight reflecting on it to glint. the thing, as if knowing we had spotted it then either took off at a high rate of speed in exactly the opposite of our line of sight, or imploded\faded in on itself and disappeared! its size was that of an advil pill held at arms length at 25 degrees straight ahead on our right as we were driving east on u.s. 36 about 7 miles from urbana ohio. duration of the sighting was around 10 seconds. i thought at first that it was some kind of metallic kite or balloon. after concluding that what we witnessed was inexplicable our feelings were that of elation for having witnessed something so incredible! someone else had to have seen it besides us a traffic was heavy at that time and the way it was reflecting light against the blue sky made it impossible to ignore. no pictures, sighting was too short. this craft was something real and not a refection on our windscreen. i got a pretty darn good look at it and it was a disc!!!
Summary: Disc was wobbling and reflecting sunlight before fading out.
